name: Battle for the Campus
description:
Battle for the Campus is a game we did for the university. We were at out 2nd year and when we were coursing the first programming assignature, there were some options for making a game as final project, We chose space invaders as our target game and maybe we put a bit more time and effort on it.

Mechanics are simple, you can move to left and right, jump and shoot upwards.

Be part of the fight defending our university from the invaders and from the final boss you'll see in Battle for the Campus.

Game by Xeraclom14 and Zso.
